title: Yes - Close To The Edge (1972/2013) [Blu-ray]
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                           Yes - Close To The Edge (1972/2013)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Artists: Yes
 Line-up: Jon Anderson - vocals
          Chris Squire - bass, vocals
          Steve Howe - guitars, vocals
          Rick Wakeman - keyboards
          Bill Bruford - percussion
 Title: Close To The Edge
 Genre: Progressive Rock
 Label: Atlantic Recording Corp / Rhino / Panegyric - GYRBD50012
 Artists Country: UK
 Released: 2013
 Originally Released: 1972
 Quality: Blu-ray
 Format: Blu-ray audio

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 The Blu-Ray features:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 - 5.1 DTS-HD Master Audio Surround (24bit/96khz) mixed from the original 
   multi-channel recordings
 - the new stereo album mix in DTS-HD Master Audio (24bit/96khz)
 - the original album mix and America in a DTS-HD Master Audio flat transfers 
   from the original master tape source. (24bit/192khz)
 - exclusive instrumental versions of all new mixes in DTS-HD Master Audio 
   stereo (24bit/96khz)
 - exclusive needle-drop of an original UK vinyl A1/B1 pressing transferred 
   in 24bit/96khz audio
 - numerous audio extras appear in high-resolution stereo including single 
   edits & studio run throughs of album tracks

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 Tracklisting:                                                                     
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2013 Stereo Mixes (mixed and produced by Steven Wilson):
 (24/96 LPCM)
 1 - Close To The Edge           [18:43]
 2 - And You And I               [10:09]
 3 - Siberian Khatru             [09:01]

 5.1 Surround Mixes (mixed and produced by Steven Wilson):
 (24/96 LPCM/DTS HD 24/48)
 1 - Close To The Edge           [18:43]
 2 - And You And I               [10:09]
 3 - Siberian Khatru             [09:01]

 Original Stereo Mixes:
 (Flat Transfer from original master, 24/192 LPCM)
 1 - Close To The Edge           [18:43]
 2 - And You And I               [10:09]
 3 - Siberian Khatru             [09:01]

 America:
 1 - America (5.1 Surround Mix)  [10:31]
 (24/96 LPCM/DTS HD 24/48)
 2 - America (2013 Stereo Mix)   [10:31]
 (24/96 LPCM)  
 3 - America (Original Mix)      [10:31]
 (Flat Transfer from original master, 24/192 LPCM)

 Additional Material:
 
 Alternate Album:
 (24/96 LPCM)
 1 - Close To The Edge           [17:42]
 (Early assembly / rough mix)
 2 - And You And I               [10:18]
 (Alt. version)
 3 - Siberia                     [09:20]
 (Studio run-through of Siberian Khatru)

 Single Versionas & Edits:
 (24/192 LPCM)
 1 - Total Mass Retain           [03:21]
 (Single edit)
 2 - And You And I               [03:29]
 (Promo single edit, mono)
 3 - And You And I               [03:29]
 (Promo single edit, stereo)
 4 - America                     [04:13]
 (Single version) 

 Blu-ray Exclusive:
 
 2013 Stereo Instrumental Mixes:
 (24/96 LPCM)
 1 - Close To The Edge           [18:43]
 2 - And You And I               [10:09]
 3 - Siberian Khatru             [09:01]
 4 - America                     [10:31]

 UK Vinyl Transfer
 (A1/B1 UK vinyl transfer, 24/96 LPCM)
 1 - Close To The Edge           [18:43]
 2 - And You And I               [10:09]
 3 - Siberian Khatru             [09:01]
